blueBox.headLine: Mission
content: The colloquium of the Chair for Theory of Science and Technology (TST) addresses a variety of topics related to the theory of (computational) science and technology for Masterâ€™s and PhD students as well as postdocs. From 2019/2020 on the colloquium is conjointly organized together with the Philosophy of Science & Technology of Computer Simulation Department (headed by Dr. Andreas Kaminski) of the High Performance Computing Center Stuttgart (HLRS). As part of the TST/HLRS Colloquium the reading group on code studies is organized by Dr. Dawid Kasprowicz and Jennifer Schaffrath.

The colloquium takes place on Thursdays during the lecture period from 3 to 6 p.m., in case of guest lectures (events) from 4 to 6 p.m. Location: Online via Zoom or CSS Lab (room 410), Theaterplatz 14, RWTH Aachen University. Accreditation is required under: dawid.kasprowicz@humtec.rwth-aachen.de.
